channel.title: [Completely serious class suggestion] Every Nk Ever
channel.description:
> <big>[color=grey]Every NK ever[/color]</big> >**[color=grey]meirl[/color]** > >**Unique and Interesting passive (Passive) -** """"Immune to Death."""" When jailed on n3, replace all well made logs with horrible knight logs. >**Ez Clap (Passive) -** When YOU play nk, all investigative abilities target you n1. Otherwise, never get asked for class until there are 5, or 3, players left. > >**lul sorc (Day)-** Place a bomb in a person, probably. If YOU have this ability, King will never die even if being obviously evil with 3 butlers in game. >**The only reason poss is even decent (Day)-** When there are 3 players left, win the game. Otherwise, be dead weight. > >**Prevented (Night)-** Never do anything. >**Possess (Night)-** Take control of any player who decided to whisper a password to king. Otherwise, use Prevented. > > **Objective:** *Convince others that YOU are guilty of treason; get yourself executed.*
I'd like some suggestions to make this class slightly less strong.

item.title: [Completely serious class suggestion] Every Nk Ever
item.dc:creator: Marcus_Doodalee
item.description:
You see, reaper often has a consistent win at 5 players if he plays his cards right and attains enough souls

And the way Sorcerer is intended to be played, you really don’t need to go late game; your bomb should take care of everyone still alive.

Read full topic

item.title: [Completely serious class suggestion] Every Nk Ever
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Think about it:

1: death immune
2: Fool wincon
3: Keeps king alive (thus making more votes who would lynch you)
4: Automatically gives you bad fake logs (good because fool wincon)
5: Whisper reading
6: Auto win if ignored for too long
7: Auto invested as K/O N1

Read full topic
